Room.Name: The University Library
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the entrance to the great University Library, the center of knolwedge for many of the great thinking persons in the world.
Room.LongDescription: The University Library is filled with tomes and scrolls of all kinds. Many are locked behind strange doors, not having been disturbed for ages. Others are behind combination locks that prevent tampering. In any case, there is more knowledge contained here than there will ever be in even the greatest mage.
